title: Discover the Artefact's Secrets
content:
arby. Perhaps we can learn more about what the artefact is there.

A guard inside the Githyanki Creche told us to report to the captain. The guards at the entrance to the Githyanki Creche mentioned a captain. We should talk to these guards to find out more about what they're doing.

The captain is looking for the artefact we carry. We should speak to her and see what we can find out.

The inquisitor is displeased with the lack of progress on the hunt for the artefact. We should speak to him to f
